Help pass the Reproductive Health Act.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Take Action Now

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

More than 20 cases are working their way through the courts in hopes of limiting or overruling Roe. With the accelerating number of states passing bills banning access to abortion care — including Ohio, Alabama, Georgia, and Missouri — that number will grow.

Illinois legislators must act now to protect reproductive rights in this state by passing the Reproductive Health Act.

The Illinois Reproductive Health Act repeals decades-old, long blocked laws, including criminal penalties. Repealing these laws will ensure access to birth control and access to abortion care in Illinois — regardless of what happens in the Supreme Court.

Without passage of the Reproductive Health Act, Illinois could again require spousal notification in order to seek abortion care; Illinois could again deny access to many types of contraceptives; and, Illinois could again restrict access to reproductive technologies including in vitro fertilization.

Contact your state representative and urge them to support the Reproductive Health Act.

Illinois can guarantee abortion rights are protected in this state, regardless of the threats around the country. The Illinois General Assembly must act now.

Thanks for sticking with us,

ACLU of Illinois
